title: Download keeps restarting
body:
Okay so I uninstalled league from like 4 month ago, and now im re downloading it. I start downloading , the download goes to 44% and restarts from 0 (10000 mb ->15000)
Please i need help
(Yes i tried it 6 times)

replies.body: If it keeps restarting like that it might be due to some hiccups in your connection. Try downloading it with a wired (ethernet) connection if possible, but if not let's go ahead and take a closer look at your network settings by following this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). The steps on port forwarding and DNS are pretty helpful, but do make sure to go through the others too.

Thanks this worked but now i'm permenantly banned . Riot please fix your system . I get trolls on my team and i get banned for flaming them                  -_-
{{champion:119}}

The ban on your account isn't from any type of connection or related to this issue you were having. This was a toxicity related ban after you had several warnings and suspensions. If you don't remember the reason or why this happened, you're welcome to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that context.
